name: Leapin' and Cheetin'
description:
Have you ever played a precision platformer SO HARD that you just felt like breaking the game?  What if we gave you the option to actually break the game...on purpose?

Leapin' and Cheetin' puts you in the position of Trixie the Cheetah, a sleazy big cat who'll do what it takes to win.  Trixie can either platform through the difficult stages on her own merit, or she can cheat and take the easy way out.  

Can you play through all of the available stages without cheating?  Or will you succumb to temptation?

Credits:
Patrick Nance
Ashley Rivas
Daniel Rivas
